snippet.title: Οfficial Trailer | StarMetal Crusaders
snippet.description:
Trailer is here!

Add to your Steam Wishlist: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2881630/StarMetal_Crusaders

Fast-paced combat, strategic depth and a universe filled with the bizarre and unexpected. StarMetal Crusaders is a galactic adventure where anything can happen!

Embark on a wild and comedic adventure across the vast and perilous Zeta Sector. Lead a ragtag crew of mercenaries through a universe filled with intrigue, danger and bizarre encounters. 

Connect with us:

Twitter: https://twitter.com/StarmetalGame
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/starmetalcrusaders/
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/starmetalcrusaders/
Discord: https://discord.com/invite/zSGsspmHgp/
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@starmetal.crusaders/

Find out more at https://www.starmetalcrusaders.com

#StarmetalCrusaders #Gaming
